text: The first day on the zombie apocalypse is really important.
Your objective is to find Puff-shrooms on the surface and punch them. When they die, they drop Plant Food.
$(br)Plant Food is a really important item, it's the main ingredient for every plant in this mod, and punching Puff-shrooms is the only way to obtain them.
After finding x2 Plant Foods, craft a Sunflower.
$(br)Sunflowers are the most important plants to make. They produce Sun, which can be used
